name: Steal Quietly!
description:
Steal Quietly! - You are an ordinary person who owes a huge amount to the most dangerous people in your city. The only option to repay the debt is to provide them with the service they ask for.

Team up with your partner and start your journey! You have to rob people and steal everything that has any value. Look for important documents that will help you pay off your debts! But be careful not to get noticed, otherwise you may attract the attention of the police. The game will definitely appeal to fans of heist films!

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Beautiful graphics
- Pleasant music
